headline.print_headline: Air India Flight Lands Safely After Engine Fire
headline.main: Air India Flight Lands Safely After Engine Fire

docs.snippet: Officials say an India-bound flight out of New Jersey was forced to return to the airport because of an engine fire....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officials say an India-bound flight out of New Jersey was forced to return to the airport because of an engine fire.

headline.print_headline: Several Injured After Philadelphia Bus Flips on Side in Crash
headline.main: Several Injured After Philadelphia Bus Flips on Side in Crash

docs.snippet: Five people were injured in Philadelphia on Sunday when a car collided with a transit bus and flipped it on its side, according to transit officials and media reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Five people were injured in Philadelphia on Sunday when a car collided with a transit bus and flipped it on its side, according to transit officials and media reports.

headline.print_headline: HSN CEO Grossman Declined Offer to Run JCPenney: WSJ
headline.main: HSN CEO Grossman Declined Offer to Run JCPenney: WSJ

docs.snippet: Mindy Grossman, the chief executive of HSN Inc, considered but turned down an opportunity to become JCPenney Co's next chief executive, the Wall Street Journal said on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mindy Grossman, the chief executive of HSN Inc, considered but turned down an opportunity to become JCPenney Co's next chief executive, the Wall Street Journal said on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.print_headline: Buchholz's 3-Hitter Leads Red Sox Over Astros 11-0
headline.main: Buchholz's 3-Hitter Leads Red Sox Over Astros 11-0

docs.snippet: Houston starter Brad Peacock was pulled in the first inning on Sunday after getting just one out....
docs.lead_paragraph: Houston starter Brad Peacock was pulled in the first inning on Sunday after getting just one out.

headline.print_headline: Hundreds Paddle Out to Recall Drowned Lifeguard
headline.main: Hundreds Paddle Out to Recall Drowned Lifeguard

docs.snippet: Hundreds of surfers paddled out on boards to remember a Southern California lifeguard who drowned a week ago while saving a swimmer caught in treacherous surf....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of surfers paddled out on boards to remember a Southern California lifeguard who drowned a week ago while saving a swimmer caught in treacherous surf.

headline.print_headline: Yacaman, Pla Take Flag-To-Flag IMSA Win in Canada
headline.main: Yacaman, Pla Take Flag-To-Flag IMSA Win in Canada

docs.snippet: Gustavo Yacaman and Olivier Pla co-drove the No. 42 OAK Racing Morgan/Nissan to a dominating, flag-to-flag victory Sunday in the IMSA United SportsCar Championship race at Canadian Tire Motorsport Park....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gustavo Yacaman and Olivier Pla co-drove the No. 42 OAK Racing Morgan/Nissan to a dominating, flag-to-flag victory Sunday in the IMSA United SportsCar Championship race at Canadian Tire Motorsport Park.

headline.print_headline: Trout 4 RBIs, Angels Beat Texas for 5th Win in Row
headline.main: Trout 4 RBIs, Angels Beat Texas for 5th Win in Row

docs.snippet: Mike Trout doubled twice and drove in four runs as the Los Angeles Angels beat the Texas Rangers 10-7 Sunday and took a five-game winning streak into the All-Star break....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Trout doubled twice and drove in four runs as the Los Angeles Angels beat the Texas Rangers 10-7 Sunday and took a five-game winning streak into the All-Star break.

docs.snippet: Colin Montgomerie is getting used to winning these big events....

headline.print_headline: Stars of Politics, Sport, Music at World Cup Final
headline.main: Stars of Politics, Sport, Music at World Cup Final

docs.snippet: Vladimir Putin chatted with Angela Merkel, and David Beckham hugged Pele at the World Cup final on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Police: Woman Dead; Companion, 3 Children Missing
headline.main: Police: Woman Dead; Companion, 3 Children Missing

docs.snippet: Authorities say a suburban New Orleans woman has been found bludgeoned to death in her bathtub and the man she lived with and his three children are missing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a suburban New Orleans woman has been found bludgeoned to death in her bathtub and the man she lived with and his three children are missing.
